price: Uzarutera umugongo (ntarwemere ndetse ntanakurikize ibirurimo), mu by’ukuri azikorera umutwaro (w’ibyaha) ku munsi w’imperuka,
arabic: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وِزۡرًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: man aʿraḍa ʿanhu fa-innahu yaḥmilu yawma al-qiyāmati wiz'ran
